name: Curved Walnut Dining Chair - Boucle
description: The Curved Walnut Dining Chair represents both luxury and comfort. The plush curves offer a reimagined modern take on 1970's design. Rich warm walnut is paired with textural off-white boucle creating a show-stopping elegant dining chair. The fixed seat is made with the highest quality foam padding and upholstered in our signature textural bouclé fabric, crafted for hours of comfortable dining. The seamlessly curved wooden frame is made from solid ash which has been stained a rich walnut.
